name: Halls of Greed
summary:
Dive into the immersive roguelite RPG experience of Halls of Greed where every decision shapes your fame and fortune. Halls of Greed delivers a thrilling blend of intense PvPvE combat, the hunt for rare loot, and strategic extraction mechanics that will keep you coming back for “just one more round.”

Set in a world teeming with ancient magic and sinister creatures, players will embark on perilous journeys to extract valuable treasures from treacherous dungeons. But beware, fellow adventurers lurk in every shadow, ready to thwart your progress and claim the spoils for themselves.

Create characters from a diverse selection of classic fantasy archetypes, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Will you embrace the devastating spells of the mage, the discipline of the knight, the precision of the ranger, or the ferocity of the primalist? Each class offers a distinct approach to how you dominate the battlefield. Whether you're engaging in one-on-one duels or clashing with rival parties in team-based skirmishes, every encounter offers unique advantages and disadvantages so choose wisely!

However, the true measure of success lies in your ability to collect rare and powerful loot scattered throughout the crypts, castle ruins, and dungeons. Uncover legendary weapons, enchanted artifacts, and valuable resources that will enhance your abilities and secure your dominance on the battlefield. Be sure to extract through one of the magical portals using a keystone and return to camp where you can improve your character, level up your loadout, and give yourself key advantages for the next run!
